main event: A bright luminous object was observed in the sky near Springfield, Massachusetts, on July 20, 1968, exhibiting erratic movements.
interesting points: The object moved erratically, speeding up and slowing down, before disappearing straight up at high speed., Several witnesses observed the object through binoculars and dismissed it as a known aircraft., The object's bright pulsating light was noted by witnesses., It was described as oval or disk-shaped and estimated to be about 50 feet long., The sighting lasted for about 11 minutes.
witness description: a group of people gathered at a farmhouse, including a father and son who reported the sighting.
